metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare is hosting Zero Trust Roadshows across APJC, bringing together IT professionals and business decision-makers across the region who want to start actioning a phased approach to Zero Trust implementation.

relatedBlades.title: Zero Trust, Zero Nonsense: Take a faster, more practical approach
Start Your Zero Trust Journey Today

features.title: VPN replacement and augmentation
features.description:
__Replace or augment your VPN__

Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA) technologies create secure boundaries around applications. When resources are protected with ZTNA, users are only allowed to access resources after verifying the identity, context, and policy adherence of each specific request.

- [VPN replacement whitepaper](https://www.cloudflare.com/static/3b06c0f764d243bc741e8a85f13a782a/Can_ZTNA_Replace_Your_VPN_Whitepaper.pdf)

- [Cloudflare ZTNA (Access) product brief](https://www.cloudflare.com/static/7a087420e450601d8e0e2de01d2b66be/Cloudflare_Access_Product_Brief.pdf)

- [Product Demo - VPN-as-a-Service](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1rZfeRXR-owl7Bo-ftfreAgMw0wT5Fj0L/view?usp=sharing)

- [Whitepaper: Can ZTNA Replace your VPN?](https://www.cloudflare.com/static/f9639e7bf41f8ce69250aee4cd260bab/Can_ZTNA_replace_your_VPN.pdf)

features.title: Internet threat and data protection
features.description:
__Protect users and data from Internet threats__

Cloudflare makes it fast and easy to level up your Internet protection with identity-based web filtering, plus natively-integrated browser isolation. Start with DNS filtering to achieve quick time-to-value for remote or office users. Deliver more comprehensive security with HTTP inspection and isolation for all Internet activity.

- [Threat Defense with Cloudflare (Solution Brief)](https://www.cloudflare.com/static/b5c19838b5447467e3f7f08e9da2d19c/Threat_Defense_with_Cloudflare_Zero_Trust_Solution_Brief.pdf)

- [Browser Isolation (whitepaper)](https://www.cloudflare.com/static/d3093bf12e93c426971667f34a74d8f1/Browser_Isolation_Whitepaper.pdf)

- [Feature Demo Video: Clientless Browser Isolation](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1B_JCZRa2Xh_kJG3CvfdQtR1Wm5x7_zYm/view)

- [Datasheet: Cloudflare Gateway](https://www.cloudflare.com/resources/assets/slt3lc6tev37/6GcZqWjqsWB8TDdVWzlsgE/bb265042263263038d2fdba072365691/Cloudflare_Gateway_Datasheet.pdf)

features.title: Remote work transformation
features.description:
__Secure your remote workforce no matter where in the world they're working from__

Cloudflare Zero Trust enables seamless, identity- and context- based application access and software-defined security, allowing you to secure your remote teams, devices, and data without sacrificing performance or user experience.

- [Solution Brief: Remote work security over the long haul](https://www.cloudflare.com/static/48be0b4844382fdfd3c0d2cfc111d6bd/Remote_Work_Solution_Brief.pdf)

- [Webinar: Employes are exhausted: how Zero Trust security can actually help](https://gateway.on24.com/wcc/eh/2153307/lp/3677922/)

- [7 Ways to Work From Anywhere ](https://cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/4mxuP8J2OZs1B6qwrarDKi/dceb610204d99f3556abe62e524f86ea/Remote_Work_Ebook.pdf)

- [Webinar: BlockFi's security evolution: Lessons in hyperscaling with CSO Adam Healy](https://gateway.on24.com/wcc/eh/2153307/lp/3576219)

features.title: Preemptively stop phishing attacks
features.description:
__Secure user inboxes, adopt a proactive security posture, and save time on email security operations__

Cloudflare Area 1 is a cloud-native email security platform. It crawls the Internet to stop phishing, Business Email Compromise (BEC), and email supply chain attacks at the earliest stages of the attack cycle. Area 1 enhances built-in security from cloud email providers with deep integrations into Microsoft and Google environments and workflows.

- [Report: 2021 Email Security Report](https://www.cloudflare.com/resources/assets/slt3lc6tev37/6HhAbLYa84R8wbMpDHMTv4/bafe24b3e8665f6c7fc2a2cb393de27a/Area_1_Security_2021_Email_Threat_Report.PDF)

- [Cloudflare Area 1 datasheet](https://www.cloudflare.com/static/d40dbf403f1f55a270556c8cef5a086f/Cloudflare_Area_1_Email_Security_Datasheet.pdf)

- [Webinar: Expanding Zero Trust with email security](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/3677497/3B393ED1F8E9B991ABD4DFB56D479384)

- [E-Book: How to Stop Business Email Compromise Threats](https://liveshare.seismic.com/i/F6WLmmB2yN8FxOo27lQHPAurQDbaNkHV5gCsaXb9lLzu9vnMNSs___NWv9g2EFnlvhBZc1V___jPLUSSIGNIwiw8LAgkw9KdhcKZEkixO___9jg___tuvpLzwEEQUALSIGN)

relatedBlades.mainHeadline: Deployment outcomes: Save time and money with Zero Trust

related_asset.title: Deployment Outcomes ROI of Zero Trust - Web SGV (Q2 2022)

relatedBlades.quote: "Cloudflare's Zero Trust services enabled us to protect our remote-first, globally distributed workforce and critical internal applications that are not exposed to the public Internet."

quoteCarousel.quote: "At Delivery Hero, we always strive to deliver an amazing experience to our customers. Cloudflare Access helps us do the same for our internal teams: offering them a secure working environment, and removing the need for a VPN to access all of our applications across the globe."

"OneTrust relies on Cloudflare to maintain our network perimeter, so we can focus on delivering technology that helps our customers be more trusted. With Cloudflare, we can easily build context-aware Zero Trust policies for secure access to our developer tools. Employees can connect to the tools they need so simply teams don't even know Cloudflare is powering the backend. It just works."

"JetBlue Travel Products needed a way to give crew-members secure and simple access to internally-managed benefit apps. Cloudflare Zero Trust Services gave us all that and more - a much more efficient way to connect business partners and crew-members to critical internal tools."

"Cloudflare Access saved us from having to develop our own Identity and Access Management (IAM) system. We don't have to build user permission functions into the apps that Access protects. We went all in; everyone in the company has a seat."

"Zero Trust is very important, but it's also incredibly difficult to implement. The only way ezCater can succeed with this is to have the right partner. Cloudflare has given us the foundation for a successful Zero Trust implementation."

"IT is evolving by leaps and bounds, and more sophisticated, more destructive cyber threats are emerging every day. Zero Trust is the only viable security model in this environment, and Cloudflare is making it a lot easier for eTeacher Group to get there."

"Discord is where the world builds relationships. Cloudflare Zero Trust Services helps us deliver on that mission, connecting our internal engineering team to the tools they need. With Cloudflare, we can rest easy knowing every request to our critical apps is evaluated for identity and context - a true Zero Trust approach."

"POLITICO needed a way to control access to specific critical resources without the risk and overhead of connecting through a private corporate network. Cloudflare Access aligns with how and where our team works, while helping us embrace a Zero Trust security model, where every request to every app is evaluated for user identity - and no VPN is required."
quoteCarousel.quoteTitle: Senior Director, Technology Operations and Cybersecurity
